measure: ban on all public, private and religious events, as well as gatherings with more than 50 people
the council of state can allow events of pubblic interest with more than 50 people
ban on all activities for associations and similar organizations like sport events, trainings and rehersals
seniors and individuals with comorbidity are recommended not to supervise children
seniors and individuals with comorbidity are rocommended not to take part in pubblic or private events
seniors and individuals with comorbidity are rocommended not to take pubblic transportations except for medical reasons, work or buying groceries
public transportations, with exception of SBB and taxis, shall take measures to reduce the places per wagon to a maximum of a half the nominal capacity
shops of non-primary necessity, are closed. Areas of non-primary necessity are to delimit and close in larger shops.
shops of primary necessity are asked to guarantee social distancing (BAG: 1 person / 4m2)
restaurants, hotels and many other categories are mandated to cease activities
the cantonal hospital of Bruderholz is reference hospital for COVID-19
hospitals must refrain all immediately necessary operations
in hospitals and hospices, the visit of patients at risk is prohibited
cantonal authorities are allowed to requisition necessary tools to handle the emergency
where possible, the cantonal administration works in home office
the public access to buildings of the cantonal administration is reduced to the minimum
orientation days of the army and civil protection are cancelled
temporary disallowance of nuit blance permits in the context of carnival
postponement of the swearing in of the Swiss Guard to October 2020
communal elections and votation scheduled for the 17.05.2020 are postponed
ban on serving food and drinks in Sissach and Liestal
